bibl.title: The Mosaic Pavements of Sheikh Zouède in Northern Sinaï.
bibl.note: A re-examination of the polychrome pavements from Sheikh Zouède, now in the Ismailiya Museum: a large figurative (triumph of Dionysos, Phaedra and Hippolytos, inscriptions [in part. I. métriques 122] ...) and a geometric mosaic. Mid IVth-mid Vth c.
bibl.seg: OVADIAH Asher, Carla GOMEZ DE SILVA and Sonia MUCZNIK, The Mosaic Pavements of Sheikh Zouède in Northern Sinaï.
Tesserae. Festschrift für Josef Engemann = JAC. Ergänzungsband 18 (Münster, 1991) pp. 181-191 et pll. 22-27.

A re-examination of the polychrome pavements from Sheikh Zouède, now in the Ismailiya Museum: a large figurative (triumph of Dionysos, Phaedra and Hippolytos, inscriptions [in part. I. métriques 122] ...) and a geometric mosaic. Mid IVth-mid Vth c.
